articles.content:

articles.author: Varsha Bansal
articles.title: The Fight Against Robocall Spam and Scams Heats Up in India
articles.description: A new proposal by India's telecom regulator aims to make accurate caller ID mandatory, but critics say it may be fundamentally flawed.
articles.content: Indian phone users may not have to wonder who that unknown caller is for too much longer. Regulatory changes being considered might help them avoid that pesky telemarketer and the annoying call from … [+3951 chars]

articles.title: India couple fined for driving SUV on sand dunes
